resources.string: Upload an image and drag your finger over it to determine the colors

Welcome to ColorVision, an app to help you identify the exact colors in an image of your choice! 
 
Whether you are colorblind or simply want to expand your color knowledge, this app is a great place to get started! 
 
 Either upload an image from your camera roll or take a new one, and then use our color identification feature to identify the colors in the image!
